title: The Pakhtakhor-79 Monument (Uzbekistan/Ukraine)
description: [MOCK DATA - title scraped from Cabinet, description invented] A monument commemorating the tragic 1979 air crash of the Pakhtakhor Tashkent football team.
commentary: [MOCK DATA] The Pakhtakhor-79 monument commemorates one of the most tragic events in Soviet football history.

author.name: Exhibition Contributors
author.bio: Soviet Central Asia in 100 Objects research team
